Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the effectiveness of the herbal plant, makabuhay, in treating the novel coronavirus.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient scientific evidence to support the effectiveness of makabuhay in treating the novel coronavirus.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the novel coronavirus can be treated with an antibiotic, which is a problematic assumption as antibiotics are ineffective against viruses.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that there is no evidence to support the use of makabuhay in treating or preventing novel coronavirus infections.
Understate: There is no indication of any bias of understating in the provided claim.
Falters at times: There is no indication of any bias of faltering at times in the provided claim.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not provide alternative explanations for the effectiveness of makabuhay in treating the novel coronavirus.
